00325         BOOLEAN m_operation_pending;

00329         class OperationLock {
00330             public:
00333                 OperationLock(BOOLEAN &operation_pending);
00334 
00336                 ~OperationLock();
00337 
00340                 BOOLEAN LockAcquired() const
00341                     { return m_lock_acquired; }
00342 
00343             private:
00344                 // External socket operation pending flag.
00345                 BOOLEAN &m_operation_pending;

00347                 // Flag indicating if the operation lock could be acquired or

00350 
00351                 // Global operation lock semaphore for all active sockets.
00352                 static Semaphore s_sem;
00353
